description: When appwrite is generated we require appwrite project ID and endpoint, this task ensure addition of environment variables in environment config service
template: final appwriteEndpoint = const String.fromEnvironment('APPWRITE_ENDPOINT', defaultValue: 'https://localhost/v1'); final appWriteProjectId = const String.fromEnvironment('APPWRITE_PROJECT_ID',);
error: The environment config generation failed for app write
name: Add appwrite environemnt config
